content: the matterhorn sweater is a classic fit top-down raglan style sweater that is super comfortable and super chic too available in sizes xs through 5xl and featuring the alpine stitch this is a sweater you re sure to enjoy making and love to wear note that the sleeves on this design are interchangeable with the sleeves on the kazbek cardigan https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/kazbek-cardigan
